name: Doctor
description: The Doctor can choose one player to protect every night. That player cannot be killed that night.

abilities.name: Doctor Protect
abilities.description: Protects one player from being attacked at night.

name: Bodyguard
description: The Bodyguard can choose one player to protect every night. That player cannot be killed that night and instead the Bodyguard will be attacked. They survive the first attack due to their strength, but will die or get inflicted by a status on the second attack. They automatically protect themselves every night before the first attack.

abilities.name: Bodyguard Shield
abilities.description: Protects one player to redirect attacks from and into oneself.

name: Vigilante
description: During the day, the Vigilante can either shoot to kill or reveal to everyone the role of another player. Both actions can only be done once, but not during the same day.

name: Jailer
description: The Jailer can select a player during the day to put in jail the following night. They can talk to the jailed player at night anonymously. Jailed players cannot use any of their abilities or be attacked. They have one bullet to kill a jailed player during the night.

name: Seer
description: The Seer can select a player to uncover their role each night.

name: Aura Seer
description: The Aura Seer can select a player to uncover their alignment each night. Those alignments could be: Good, Evil, or Unknown. Evil players belong to the Werewolves Team and good players belong to the Village team.

name: Medium
description: The Medium can talk anonymously with the dead during the night. They can select a dead villager at night to revive at the start of the next day once per game.

name: Regular Werewolf
description: The Werewolf can vote on a player to kill and talk with the other Werewolves each night.

name: Wolf Shaman
description: At night, the Wolf Shaman can talk and vote with the other werewolves. During the day, the Wolf Shaman can enchant another player. This will make that player appear as a Wolf Shaman to the Seer, Aura Seer, Detective, Gambler, Violinist and Analyst for the next night. If the Wolf Shaman chooses someone to enchant and then gets lynched the same day, that player will still appear as Wolf Shaman that night.

name: Wolf Seer
description: Each night the Wolf Seer can select a player to uncover their role. They can talk with the other Werewolves and provide any information they found. However, the Wolf Seer cannot vote on a player to kill unless they resign their ability to see roles. If they are the last Werewolf alive, they instantly resign their inform ability.

name: Alpha Werewolf
description: The Alpha Werewolf has the same abilities as a regular Werewolf and can vote on one player to kill each night. However, when the Alpha Werewolf votes on a player to kill during the night, their vote counts twice. Additionally, the Alpha Werewolf can send unlimited private messages to the other wolves during the day that only the Werewolf Team can see.

name: Fool
description: The Fool has no special abilities besides talking and voting during the day.

name: Headhunter
description: The Headhunter is assigned a target at the start of the game. Their goal is to get their target lynched by the village during the day. Their target must be lynched before you die in order to win. If their target dies another way, they will win with the village.

name: Cupid
description: On the first night, the Cupid selects 2 players to become a Love Couple. These players are now loyal to each other and not their original team (although the players can still win with their original team). If one of these players dies, the other will die as well. Can be chosen as an accomplice by the bandit.

name: Loudmouth
description: The Loudmouth can select a player. That player's role will be revealed to everyone when the Loudmouth dies.

name: Villager
description: The Villager is a member of the Village team without any special abilities.

name: Witch
description: The Witch has two potions. One will kill and the other will protect a player. The protect potion is only consumed if the player is attacked. The poison cannot be used in the first night.

name: Detective
description: The Detective can select two players to uncover if they are in the same team each night. Those possible teams are: Village, Werewolves, Fool, Headhunter, Serial killer, and Other Solo Killers/Converters

name: Cursed
description: The Cursed begins the game as a villager. If the Cursed is attacked by the werewolves, the player does not die, but instead turns into a Regular Werewolf. The cursed can't be turned to another team by the Sect Leader, Zombie, or Bandit.

name: Junior Werewolf
description: Each night the Junior Werewolf can vote on a player to kill like a regular Werewolf. They can also select one player to die with them. They can select this player during any phase of the game. The Junior's selected player will not die if they flee.

name: Serial Killer
description: Each night the Serial Killer can kill one player. They cannot be killed by the Werewolves. However, they are in competition with the Werewolves, as both win if they kill enough people.

name: Corruptor
description: Each night the Corruptor can select one player to glitch. That player will not be able to speak, vote, use their role ability or send emojis the following day and will die after the voting. That player's role will not be revealed when they die. Instead, it will be replaced by a question mark. When a person is corrupted, they will receive a message. An icon will also show in the middle of the screen.

name: Arsonist
description: The Arsonist can choose from two actions to perform each night. They can either douse 2 players in gasoline, or ignite all doused players, killing them. The Arsonist cannot be killed by the Werewolves.

name: Beast Hunter
description: At night, the Beast Hunter can place a trap on a player, which will become active the following night. This player cannot be killed at night. If the player is attacked by werewolves, the weakest werewolf will die. The attack of Solo Killers, will trigger the trap, but not kill them.

name: Mayor
description: The Mayor can reveal their role to everyone during the day which will make their vote count double during the rest of the game.

name: Sheriff
description: The Sheriff can select two players to watch during the night. If either player dies during the night, the Sheriff will uncover two possible suspects who might have killed that player.

name: Flower Child
description: The Flower Child is a villager who can protect a player once from being lynched by the village during the day.

name: Bandit
description: At night, the Bandit finds an Accomplice by converting another player. Then each night, the Bandit and the Accomplice can select a player to kill. The chosen target of the Accomplice is prioritized over the Bandit. If they vote different players, then the deciding vote will be the Accomplice's vote. The Bandit cannot be killed by the werewolves. Only villagers and random voting roles can be converted to Accomplice. Trying to convert a werewolf will result in the Bandit killing that werewolf. If the Accomplice dies, the Bandit can select a new Accomplice the next night. If there are several accomplices in the same game, all of them win when the Bandit wins.

name: Red Lady
description: The Red Lady can visit another player at night. If they are attacked while visiting, they will not be killed. However, if they visit a player that is attacked, or a werewolf or a solo killer, they will die.

name: Priest
description: The Priest can throw holy water on another player once during the day. If that player is a werewolf, they die. If they are not a werewolf, the Priest dies.

name: Guardian Wolf
description: During the voting period, the Guardian Wolf can save a player from being lynched by the village. Once the Guardian Wolf successfully saves a player, its ability will be consumed.

name: Shadow Wolf
description: The Shadow Wolf has the same abilities as an ordinary werewolf and can vote for a player to kill each night. However, once per game, the Shadow Wolf can double your team's votes during the day, while hiding all votes.

name: Nightmare Werewolf
description: Twice during the day in a game, the Nightmare Werewolf can decide to put a player to sleep for the next night. This means that the sleeping player cannot use their role abilities the night after they were put to sleep.
